summary: 1 HIGH UX issue, 1 MEDIUM warning display concern, 1 LOW feedback gap

issues.title: All Themes Filtered panel missing actionable guidance
issues.why: When all themes are filtered, user sees status but no explanation of why or what to do next. Breaks user journey - system detects problem but doesn't help user fix it.
issues.fix: Enhance panel with: (1) Why filtered (breakdown), (2) Is this expected?, (3) Recommended actions (review conversations, check classification). Add buttons to view source data and filter reasons.
issues.verify: User test: show 'all filtered' state to PM, ask 'what would you do?'

issues.title: Warning display limit not communicated to user
issues.why: If warnings truncated to 'max 5', user has incomplete picture of data quality. 50 filtered themes but only 5 warnings shown = incorrect mental model.
issues.fix: Either: (1) Show 'X of Y warnings' with 'Show all' button, OR (2) Aggregate warnings by reason: '35 themes: low confidence + not in vocabulary'

issues.title: No success feedback when quality gates pass
issues.why: When themes_filtered = 0, no positive feedback. User doesn't know if quality gates are running or if batch is high quality.
issues.fix: Add success indicator: 'All X themes passed quality gates' with checkmark when themes_filtered = 0
